name: elvish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or like an elf (= an imaginary magical being in stories, often like a small person with pointed ears): A young woman of elvish origin suddenly appeared from the trees. She is fascinated by Iceland's elvish folklore and spectacular volcanoes. Synonym
elfishRelated word
elfCompare
elfin
More examplesFewer examplesThe elvish kingdoms compete with one another for power.He was so attracted by her elvish looks that he gave her his phone number.Is this an elvish language, or a lost language of humans?He invented the elvish languages he uses in his books.The story is about a beautiful elvish princess.
